sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using BellyFed, a platform for food reviews, social connections, and restaurant discoveries, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to all these terms, you may not use our services. These terms may be updated periodically, and your continued use constitutes acceptance of any changes.
list: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account
You agree to receive communications from us regarding your account and social interactions
You understand that content may be moderated
You accept our right to terminate accounts that violate these terms
You acknowledge this is a social platform for food enthusiasts
You understand the public nature of shared content
You agree to our community guidelines

sections.title: 2. User Registration and Social Features
sections.content: To contribute reviews, connect with others, and participate in our food community, you must register for an account. You agree to:
list: Provide accurate and complete profile information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Promptly update any changes to your information
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Not create multiple accounts for deceptive purposes
Not impersonate others or misrepresent your identity
Keep your password secure and confidential
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
Respect other users' privacy and preferences
Follow social interaction guidelines
Maintain appropriate social boundaries
Use social features responsibly

sections.title: 3. Content Guidelines
sections.content: When posting reviews, photos, comments, and other content on BellyFed, you must:
list: Provide honest and factual reviews based on personal experience
Respect restaurant owners, staff, and other users
Only post photos and videos you have taken or have rights to use
Avoid hate speech, discrimination, or harassment
Not post fake reviews or engage in review manipulation
Not post content that is defamatory or misleading
Not include personal information about others
Not promote competing services or businesses
Maintain civil discourse in comments and responses
Accept that content may be moderated or removed
Follow food photography guidelines
Respect copyright and intellectual property rights
Provide trigger warnings for sensitive content
Tag content appropriately

sections.title: 4. Social Interaction Rules
sections.content: When engaging with other users on our platform:
list: Treat all users with respect and courtesy
Do not engage in harassment or bullying
Respect privacy settings and boundaries
Do not spam or send unwanted messages
Follow community guidelines in group discussions
Use appropriate language and tone
Report inappropriate behavior
Do not share private conversations publicly
Respect blocking and muting choices
Do not create or spread rumors
Maintain professional conduct in business interactions

Clearly label sponsored content and ads
Respect advertising guidelines and restrictions

sections.title: 5. Food Review Guidelines
sections.content: When posting food and restaurant reviews:
list: Base reviews on personal dining experience
Provide balanced and fair assessments
Include relevant details about your visit
Respect food safety and health regulations
Do not make false claims about establishments
Consider cultural sensitivity in reviews
Provide constructive criticism
Update reviews when appropriate
Disclose any compensated reviews
Follow photo and video guidelines
Respect restaurant policies
Maintain objectivity in assessments

list: You retain ownership of your original content
